text.p: These are some of the leading stories in Israeli newspapers on Friday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- 11 Israeli soldiers and 69 Palestinians killed in clashes; 100s of Palestinians and 58 Israelis wounded.
- U.S.'s Christopher proposes Israel close Jerusalem tunnel that sparked clashes.
- Special deployment in Jerusalem ahead of Friday prayers.
- Incidents in the territories are very bad regarding U.S. investment.
- Government sources: Construction, tourism and agriculture are sectors principally harmed by the renewal of violence in the territories.
- High demand delays Orckit initial public offering on the Nasdaq; offering expected to take place tonight following one- day postponement.
